email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a 100,000 MT cargo. The vessel has a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per MT. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per MT, which I believe is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 per MT is acceptable. However, we would like to cap the demurrage at $12,000 per day. Can we proceed with these terms? Also, please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, we can agree to cap the demurrage at $12,000 per day. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with these terms. Please let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this shipment. Best, John
